node.title: Amazing View at Ooty, Hill Station in India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
We all thrive for an amazing holiday be it a beach, hill station or a farm house in the calm and serene place. Since we are so much busy in our day to day life we usually ignore the beauty of a simple thing.

I am sharing some of the amazing views which we failed to notice in the midst of all the beauties around the world. 

These pictures were taken from my hotel room in Ooty, which is one of the hill station in Southern part of India.

According to Wikipedia :

>Udagamandalam (also Ootacamund) and abbreviated as Udhagai and Ooty is a town and municipality in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is located 86  km north of Coimbatore and 158  km south of Mysore and is the capital of the Nilgiris district. It is a popular hill station located in the Nilgiri Hills.

>Originally occupied by the Toda, the area came under the rule of the East India Company at the end of the 18th century. The economy is based on tourism and agriculture, along with the manufacture of medicines and photographic film. The town is connected by the Nilgiri ghat roads and Nilgiri Mountain Railway. Its natural environment attracts tourists and it is a popular summer destination. As of 2011, the town had a population of 88,430.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZPDdbPjePP3cYZE2HPdBbF4Rn7x9GVJFU5R9GLeMMnpj/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQSsroouvY5ufxCRpmY8FAh3ovUwagDYfaKRzTHy9Unbb/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeDdFd3ntCLt3uvE618rk5XB6FgpYuGSitnSFRhrVY62c/image.png)

# Upvote, Follow, Resteem @codingdefined

node.title: Are you Vegetarian?
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
### I would like to ask you a question "Are you Vegetarian?".
##

I once had a conversation with my friend on being vegetarian. He asked me Are you Vegetarian?, I said Yes. Then he said that he is also a Vegetarian but he eats fish. I said dude seriously you eat fish and you are saying you are vegetarian. 

**A Vegetarian is a person who does not eat meat, poultry, egg, and fish**

#### Vegetarians are classified in three ways.
####

1. Vegans or total vegetarians who exclude all animal products(meat, poultry, fish, eggs, milk and other dairy products). Many vegans also do not eat honey.

2. Lactovegetarians exclude meat, poultry, fish, and eggs but include dairy products.

3. Lacto-ovo-vegetarians exclude meat, poultry, and fish but include dairy products. and eggs.

Now the funny part, "How a friend will introduce you to his friends if you are a vegetarian?". Hey, all this is my friend and he is a vegetarian. Seriously this is the introduction!

Now coming to the health benefit of being vegetarian. Do you know Brad Pitt, Steven Spielberg and many are becoming vegetarian due to the health concerns? According to American Diabetic Association vegetarians are at lower risk for developing Heart disease, diabetes, obesity, and hypertension. There are a number of reasons for becoming vegetarian. Some people are vegetarian because they are following some religion. Some people are vegetarian because they are against animal cruelty. Some believe that being vegetarian is overall a healthy diet to follow. 

How many times have you asked a vegetarian why they are vegetarian and end up having an argument with them. The most common question to vegetarians is, what you eat since you don't have enough varieties of food.
 
According to a great scientist Einstein: "Nothing will benefit human health and increase the chances for survival of life on Earth as much as the evolution to a vegetarian diet." And I can proudly say I am a Vegeterian.

node.title: Maharajas' Express in India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
In my last post, I have discussed about one of the luxurious trains in India [Palace on Wheels](https://steemit.com/luxury/@codingdefined/palace-on-wheels-in-india). Bdw in India we do have a lot of luxurious trains and one of them is Maharajas's Express. Maharajas' Express, is an initiative by IRCTC (Indian Railways Catering and Tourism Corporation), is equivalent to the Orient Express of Europe.

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/be/Maharajas%27_Express.jpg
By Aswin Krishna Poyil (Own work) [CC0], via Wikimedia Commons

It consists of -

**Mayur Mahal**

The Sitting Lounge of the Maharajas' Express is the perfect place to forget your tiredness of the day’s sightseeing. Just sit back, relax and admire the comfortable ambiance.

**Rang Mahal**

This is a restaurant with its serene interiors and glittering furnishing also houses 42 guests at a time and serves an eclectic melange of world cuisines.

**Safari Bar**

The lounge bar housed within Maharaja Express that guests can visit in order to unwind in a perfectly nonchalant yet suave ambiance after a tiring day of sightseeing and travel.

**Routes**

There are mainly 7 routes which Maharajas' take and the they have different name

1. The Indian Splendor (Delhi - Agra - Ranthambore - Jaipur - Bikaner - Jodhpur - Udaipur - Balasinor - Mumbai)
2. The Indian Panorama (Delhi - Jaipur - Ranthambore - Fatehpur Sikri - Agra - Gwalior - Khajuraho - Varanasi - Lucknow - Delhi)
3. Treasures of India (Delhi - Agra - Ranthambore - Jaipur - Delhi)
4. Gems of India (Delhi - Agra - Ranthambore - Jaipur - Delhi)
5. The Heritage of India (Mumbai - Ajanta - Udaipur - Jodhpur - Bikaner - Jaipur - Ranthambore - Agra - Delhi)
6. The Southern Jewels (Trivandrum - Chettinad - Mahabalipuram - Mysore - Hampi - Goa - Mumbai)
7. The Southern Sojourn (Mumbai - Goa - Hampi - Mysore - Cochin - Kumarakom - Trivandrum)

Maharajas' Express can take up-to 84 passengers and have different cabins like Deluxe Cabin ( Area: 112 Sq. Ft ), Junior Suite ( Area: 150 Sq. Ft ), Suite ( Area : 220 Sq. Ft ) and Presidential Suite ( Area: 448 Sq. Ft ). It also has Dining Car, Bar and Lounge to improve your expreience.

**Fares**

**Heritage of India (8 Days/ 7 Nights)**

Deluxe Cabins - USD 6,840.00
Junior Suite - USD 9,890.00
Suite - USD 13,800.00
Presidential Suite - USD 23,700.00

**Treasures of India (4 Days/ 3 Nights)**

Deluxe Cabins	- USD 3,850.00
Junior Suite - USD 4,950.00
Suite - USD 7,600.00
Presidential Suite - USD 12,900.00

**Gems of India(4 Days/ 3 Nights)**

Deluxe Cabins - USD 3,850.00
Junior Suite - USD 4,950.00
Suite - USD 7,600.00
Presidential Suite - USD 12,900.00

**Indian Panorama (8 Days/ 7 Nights)**

Deluxe Cabins - USD 5,980.00
Junior Suite - USD 9,460.00
Suite - USD 13,800.00
Presidential Suite - USD 23,700.00

**Indian Splendor (8 Days/ 7 Nights)**

Deluxe Cabins - USD 5,980.00
Junior Suite - USD 9,460.00
Suite - USD 13,800.00
Presidential Suite - USD 23,700.00

**The Southern Jewels (8 Days/ 7 Nights)**

Deluxe Cabins - USD 7,530.00
Junior Suite - USD 10,880.00
Suite - USD 15,180.00
Presidential Suite - USD 26,070.00

**The Southern Sojourn (8 Days/ 7 Nights)**

Deluxe Cabins - USD 7,530.00
Junior Suite - USD 10,880.00
Suite - USD 15,180.00
Presidential Suite - USD 26,070.00

So, next time on your travel to India, do consider enjoying this awesome luxurious train

node.title: Palace on Wheels in India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/52/Palace_on_Wheels_Jaipur.jpg/1920px-Palace_on_Wheels_Jaipur.jpg)
By Rainer Haeßner - Self-photographed, CC BY-SA 3.0, https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=27709960

Yes you heard it right, here in India if you want to have a luxurious vacation (live life a king size) then you should consider Palace on Wheels. As you all know India is always popular about its rich heritage be it Palace, great buildings, architectures, temples etc, now you can also experience that while your next visit to India.

"Palace on Wheels" is a virtual 5-star palace running on wheels. Its actually a train which will take you around to the 7 awesome cities for a duration of 7 nights and 8 days. Point to be noted that it is listed as Top 10 luxurious trains in the world (one more reason, :P).

The itinerary of Palace on Wheels are :

**Day 01 – Wednesday: Delhi Cantt Railway Station**

The Royal Luxurious Journey starts from 17:45 hrs from Delhi where the passengers get a grand welcome (obviously in a traditional form).

**Day 02 – Thursday: Jaipur, Rajasthan**

Arrival: 00.00 hrs
Breakfast on Board: 7.30-8.15 hrs
Sightseeing: 8.30-12.30hrs
Lunch at a Palace Hotel: 13.00-14.30hrs
Sightseeing: 14.30-16.45 hrs
Departure for Jaisalmer: 17:30 hrs
Dinner on Board: 20.00 hrs

**Day 03 – Friday: Jaisalmer, Rajasthan**

Arrival: 6.15 hrs
Breakfast on Board: 7.30 – 8.15 hrs
Sightseeing: 8.30 – 12.30 hrs
Lunch on Board and Rest: 13.00 – 14.30 hrs
Visit Sand Dunes and Camel Ride: 17.00 – 19.00 hrs
Dinner with Cultural Programme at Jaisalmer: 19.30 – 22.00 hrs
Departure for Jodhpur: 23.00 hrs

**Day 04 – Saturday: Jodhpur**

Arrival: 8.00 hrs
Breakfast on Board: 7.30 – 8.15 hrs
Sightseeing – 8.30: 12.30 hrs
Lunch at a Palace Hotel: 13.00 – 15.00 hrs
Departure for Sawai Madhopur: 15.30 hrs
Dinner on Board: 20.00 hrs

**Day 05 – Sunday: Sawai Madhopur – Chittaurgarh**

Arrival: 4.00 hrs
Breakfast on Board: 6.30 – 7.00 hrs
Visit National Park: 7.00 – 10.00 hrs
Departure for Chittaurgarh: 11.00 hrs
Lunch on Board: 13.00 hrs
Sight seeing-Chittaurgarh Fort: 16.00 – 18.00 hrs
Departure for Udaipur: 18.30 hrs
Dinner on Board: 20.00 hrs

**Day 06 – Monday: Udaipur**

Breakfast on Board: 6.45 – 7.15 hrs
Sightseeing at Udaipur: 7.30 – 9.30 hrs
Lunch at a Palace Hotel: 12.30 – 14.30 hrs
Departure for Bharatpur: 16.00 hrs
Dinner on Board: 20.00 hrs

**Day 07 – Tuesday: Bharatpur – Agra**

Arrival: 05.00 hrs
Visit National Bird Sanctuary: 7.30 – 8.30 hrs
Breakfast at Forest Lodge: 8.30 – 9.30hrs
Departure for Agra: 10.00 hrs
Sightseeing at Fatehpur Sikri: 10.30 – 11.30 hrs
Lunch on Board: 13.00 hrs
Sightseeing Agra and Tajmahal: 15.00 – 17.00 hrs
Departure for Delhi: 23.00 hrs

**Day 08 – Wednesday: Back to Delhi**

Arrival: 4.00 hrs
Breakfast on board: 8.00 – 9.00 hrs

Official Website : http://palaceonwheels.net/new/home.htm

Tariff :

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmThZ71RRm4uxj5BmeXhNZjuTcSv5bPMpqR9LcbZaJj35o/image.png)
From - http://www.thepalaceonwheels.com/schedule-tariff.html

So, next time on your travel to India, do consider enjoying this awesome luxurious train

node.title: Eagerly waiting for Shri Ganesha Festival
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Ganesh Chaturthi also known as Vinayaka Chaturthi is the Hindu festival that is celebrated all over India but mainly in Maharashtra and Karnataka. We start the festival with the installation of Ganesha clay idols privately in homes, or publicly on elaborate pandals and it is celebrated for a day and a half, 3 days, 5 days, 7 days or 11 days depending on the family tradition and commitment of each individual.

Few pictures of Last Year's Ganesha Festival. In Bangalore they decorate each street with lights.

![WP_20140829_19_14_16_Pro.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXk8w94VxBpcMSnfWsKhb2EzQr2HiwY1x5K84MJkbGX9E/WP_20140829_19_14_16_Pro.jpg)

![WP_20140829_19_33_32_Pro.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbzSC3e2aFwikB4Bdv47KBDQMJT4usEj1xSNatXkQgcDE/WP_20140829_19_33_32_Pro.jpg)

![WP_20140829_19_34_58_Pro.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcm9qRQipPNf8D3bSUoUNeo41PVVY1TXmHdoUnhujPYaD/WP_20140829_19_34_58_Pro.jpg)

![WP_20150917_19_40_33_Pro.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaND5JUTR4i7KQZYxR4Uk8oFjqYz5Ug9rq8HHY5TQRVq1/WP_20150917_19_40_33_Pro.jpg)

In our office also it is celebrated but in the small form

![WP_20150923_10_00_13_Pro.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbQ5VQTGtVFCunn9ay1Qb6ZY6EUp8VP4VJc6Jpi42Hjmu/WP_20150923_10_00_13_Pro.jpg)

This year the preparation has been started because Ganesh Chaturthi is been celebrated on 25th August i.e. only 4 days to go. You will see all the Ganesha Idols are being getting sold on the footpaths.

![WP_20140828_17_56_18_Pro.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbANYxBu8PDpfJTxhrrvqYFV6s8Dqfds8a8G1xScykgPw/WP_20140828_17_56_18_Pro.jpg)

Hope you liked it.

node.title: Golden Globe in Pondichurry
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
The golden globe is one of the most wonderful creations on earth. It has no Ac, no lights externally. Everything is handled naturally. The inner chamber was a wonderful experience. It is very peaceful with the crystal ball placed amidst the water body around it.

More at [WikiPedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Auroville)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVCrCrwM2JWWsos4P8n2cvU77VdmwjLZuVVBpfQKsiNtc/image.png)
